title: Shoujo Kakumei Utena (Revolutionary Girl Utena)
synopsis: After meeting a traveling prince who consoled her after the deaths of her parents, Utena Tenjou vowed to become a prince herself. The prince left Utena only with a ring bearing a strange rose crest and a promise that she would meet him again some day.
related_anime: ['Shoujo Kakumei Utena', 'Shoujo Kakumei Utena: Adolescence Mokushiroku']
